mutants.code:
def longest_common_pattern_length(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    list_A = list(A)
    list_B = list(B)
    unique_chars_A = set(list_A)
    common_count = 1
    for char in unique_chars_A:
        count_in_A = list_A.count(char)
        count_in_B = list_B.count(char)
        common_count += min(count_in_A, count_in_B)
    return common_count

def longest_common_pattern_length(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    list_A = list(A)
    list_B = list(B)
    unique_chars_A = set(list_A)
    common_count = -1
    for char in unique_chars_A:
        count_in_A = list_A.count(char)
        count_in_B = list_B.count(char)
        common_count += min(count_in_A, count_in_B)
    return common_count

def longest_common_pattern_length(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    list_A = list(A)
    list_B = list(B)
    unique_chars_A = set(list_A)
    common_count = 0
    for char in unique_chars_A:
        count_in_A = list_A.count(char)
        count_in_B = list_B.count(char)
        common_count -= min(count_in_A, count_in_B)
    return common_count
